mapper.update: update t_cart set quantity=#{quantity} where cart_id=#{cartId}
mapper.select: select cart_id,quantity from t_cart where user_id=#{userId} and product_id=#{productId}
select t_cart.cart_id,t_product.product_name,t_product.product_image,t_product.product_price from t_cart left join t_product on t_cart.product_id=t_product.product_id where t_cart.user_id=#{userId}
